fulltext:
AN NGUYEN 
OBJECTIVE  
Provide SEO skill support in a company as SEO specialist 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
09/2018 – present 
Car Classifieds Company Limited – Carmudi.vn 
SEO leader 
Responsibilities: 
 
Optimize campaigns to improve their efficiency through ad 
copy testing, keyword refinement and landing page 
optimization. 
 
Build new landing pages, templates and websites 
 
Creation of site layout/user interface from provided design 
concepts by using standard HTML/CSS practices. 
 
Understand and know to how design the landing pages 
(template, form…) 
 
Manage project tasks, timelines, and communication. 
 
Report of Head of Marketing 
 
Assign SEO tasks for team members 
10/2017 – 09/2018 
On Target LTD 
SEO Leader 
Responsibilities: 
 
Developing, monitoring the performance of digital marketing 
activities and executing online advertising and promotion 
programs. 
 
Tracking competitor activities by continually update all 
changes in the market and the marketing mix used by 
competitors. 
 
Running links system (blogs, webs) 
 
Providing creative ideas for content marketing and update 
website 
 
Conducting statistical analysis and reporting based on 
campaign results 
07/2014 – 09/2017 
Global Online Branding JSC 
SEO Specialist 
Responsibilities: 
 
Initiated search engine optimization within each account in 
order to increase client’s page rank on all major search 
engines.  
 
Perform ongoing keyword discovery, expansion and 
optimization. 
 
Analysis and assessment of the market through keywords. 
 
Planning and implementation increase keywords ranking for 
website. 
 
Monitoring, assessing and reporting results ranking SEO 
CONTACT

090 8753 529

keywords.
